message: I like it, but the drop shadow in the font makes it seem a little fuzzy & weird on the eyes. Then again I've just woken up from my caffeine-crash induced coma so perhaps that's just me.
Simple and clean. I'd try lining the edges of the white box up with either your name, the icons or both.
I agree with @Lloyd, the dark drop shadow on the black fonts is a little weird on the the eyes. Every thing else is very cool though!
